CD-ROM id the same for both types, 0x1c0b. pls include the second modem ID in lib3g.c 
Huawei E173s

DefaultVendor?= 0x12d1
DefaultProduct?=0x1c0b

TargetVendor?= 0x12d1
TargetProductList?="1c05,1c08"

MessageContent?="55534243123456780000000000000011062000000100000000000000000000"
Key Features and Specs: * microSD card slot * Microsoft Vista/Windows 7/XP, Microsoft/Mac OS 10.5 compatible Plug and Play function (all files are installed in the unit) * Mobile Internet and Intranet access * Operating System: MS Win2000, Win XP, Vista, Windows 7, Mac OS version for 10.5 and 10.6, Android 4.0.X * Data transmission via WCDMA (UMTS)/HSDPA/HSUPA * Up to 32 GB maximum memory expansion * Memory Type: Micro SD Card (up to 32GB) * Download speeds up to 7.2 Mbit/s * Upload speed up to 5.76 Mbit/s * Dimensions: 26mm * 84mm * 40mm [[Category:English Documentation]]
